item.title: 日本病毒式赛马视频游戏让玩家涌向现实生活中的马厩
item.description:
《Umamusume：《Umamusume: Pretty Derby》 引发了动画改编、现场音乐会和新的赛道粉丝团。【原文：

With more than 30 million downloads, Umamusume: Pretty Derby has generated anime adaptations, live concerts and a new legion of racetrack fans.

】

item.title: 白银创历史新高，亚洲矿业股年底大涨
item.description: 周一银价飙升至历史新高后，亚洲矿业公司股价大涨。【原文：Shares of Asian mining companies surged after silver prices spiked to an all-time high on Monday.】

item.title: 中国将为数字人民币支付利息以促进其应用
item.description: 经过大约十年的开发和测试，中国即将开始为其官方数字货币支付利息，以推动更多的人使用这种货币。【原文：China is about to start paying interest on its official digital currency in a fresh push to get more people to use it after about a decade of development and testing.】

item.title: 发行商追逐海外估值，泰国 IPO 旱或将持续
item.description: 一位高级官员说，泰国陷入困境的首次公开募股市场将继续低迷，因为该国的市场改革需要时间来避免公司在其他地方上市。【原文：Thailand’s beleaguered initial public offering scene is set to remain subdued as the country’s market revamp needs time to stave off companies listing elsewhere, a senior official said.】

item.title: 中国国家媒体警告不要对人民币下单边赌注
item.description: 中国国家媒体警告不要对人民币进行单向押注，这表明官方对人民币近期的上涨速度越来越感到不安。【原文：Chinese state media has cautioned against making one-way bets on the yuan, signaling growing official discomfort about the pace of recent gains in the currency.】

item.title: 英国假期后伦敦铜价反弹至创纪录的 13,000 美元附近
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所的铜价在休市两天后以看涨形式重新开盘，价格大涨近 7%，创下历史新高。【原文：Copper reopened in bullish form after a two-day break on the London Metal Exchange, with prices surging nearly 7% to an all-time high.】

item.title: Coupang 为数据泄露受害者提供 10 亿美元赔偿
item.description: Coupang 将向受韩国有史以来最大数据泄露事件影响的所有客户提供价值超过 10 亿美元的赔偿。【原文：Coupang is offering compensation worth more than $1 billion to all customers affected by South Korea’s biggest-ever data breach.】

item.title: 北京驻港金融联系人离职
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国驻香港的最高金融特使在任职一年多后即将离任，结束了备受业界关注的任期。【原文：China’s top financial envoy in Hong Kong is set to leave after just over a year in the role, concluding a tenure closely watched by the sector, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 谢因鲍姆称墨西哥列车脱轨事故造成 13 人死亡，98 人受伤
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆说，在南部瓦哈卡州发生的火车脱轨事故中，已有 13 人死亡，98 人受伤。【原文：Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum said that 13 people have died and 98 have been injured in a train derailment in the southern state of Oaxaca.】

item.title: 日本央行记录显示实际利率仍处于低位，表明将进一步加息
item.description: 日本央行董事会的一些成员在本月早些时候举行的一次会议上表示，日本的实际利率仍然很低，当局提高了基准利率，这表明日本央行可能会进一步提高利率。【原文：Some members of the Bank of Japan’s board signaled that the country’s real interest rate remains very low during a meeting earlier this month where authorities raised the benchmark rate, suggesting that further increases are likely in store.】

item.title: 全球基金回流让东南亚成为 2026 年的焦点
item.description: 全球资本本月重返东南亚股市，使东南亚成为 2026 年全球金融业必须关注的地区之一。【原文：Global capital is coming back to Southeast Asia’s stock markets this month, positioning the cohort as one of the must-watch pockets of global finance for 2026.】

item.title: 中国承诺支持明年经济增长，原油上涨
item.description: 由于中国需求改善的前景，以及由美国主导的结束乌克兰战争的谈判未能取得突破，石油价格上涨。【原文：Oil ticked higher on prospects for improved Chinese demand, and as US-led talks to end the war in Ukraine failed to yield a breakthrough.】

item.title: 朝鲜金正日在西海上空试射远程巡航导弹
item.description: 朝鲜表示，周日在西海上空进行了远程战略巡航导弹发射演习，在地区紧张局势下继续展示其武器能力。【原文：North Korea said it conducted a long-range strategic cruise missile launch drill over the West Sea on Sunday as it continues to showcase its weapons capabilities amid regional tensions.】

item.title: 白银在年末历史性反弹中升至创纪录的 80 美元以上
item.description: 白银攀升至创纪录水平，首次突破每盎司 80 美元，延续了年末的历史性涨势。【原文：Silver climbed to a record, pushing beyond $80 an ounce for the first time to extend a historic end-of-year rally.】

item.title: 一位默默无闻的前镍矿交易商如何成为印尼镍矿大王
item.description:
阿里夫-库尔尼亚万（Arif Kurniawan）的财富和影响力随着东南亚国家快速扩张的金属行业而上升。【原文：

Arif Kurniawan’s fortunes and influence have risen with those of the Southeast Asian nation’s fast-expanding metals industry.

】

item.title: 美国人观看的新节目越来越少，免费电视越来越多
item.description: 我们分析了几年来的数据，以评估我们的流媒体习惯发生了哪些变化【原文：We analyzed several years of data to assess how our streaming habits have changed】

item.title: 印尼将修订货币市场基准利率
item.description: 印度尼西亚将于本周逐步淘汰一项关键的货币市场基准，结束长达数年的过渡，与全球标准接轨。【原文：Indonesia is set to phase out a key money-market benchmark this week, concluding a years-long transition to align with global standards.】

item.title: 亚洲股市在清淡交投中迎来低迷开局：市场综述
item.description: 随着年末交易的逐渐结束，亚洲股市开盘表现平淡，此前美国股市在上周五波澜不惊的交易中收盘变化不大。【原文：Asian stocks were poised for a muted open as trading winds down toward year-end and after US shares closed little changed after a choppy session on Friday.】

item.title: 习近平盯住特朗普的胜利之年掩盖了中国的困境
item.description: 对于习近平主席来说，开始时充满挑战的一年正在胜利的音符中结束。【原文：For President Xi Jinping, what began as a challenging year is ending on a note of triumph.】

item.title: 2025 年如何成为印度 IPO 年
item.description: 2025 年，从保险公司到珠宝商和电子商务平台，印度各行各业的公司纷纷向公众出售股票，使这一年成为创纪录的上市年。外国投资者和国内投资者都踊跃参与，银行家们加班加点完成交易。【原文：Indian companies of all stripes — from insurers to jewelers and e-commerce platforms — rushed to sell shares to the public in 2025, making it a record year for listings. Foreign and domestic investors alike piled in, with bankers working overtime to get deals across the line.】

item.title: 2025 年的 11 笔大交易：泡沫、蟑螂和飞跃 367
item.description: 这又是定罪率高、反转快的一年。【原文：It was another year of high-conviction bets — and fast reversals.】

item.title: 遭美国签证禁令打击的前欧盟官员敦促欧盟反击
item.description: 上周被特朗普政府制裁的前欧盟官员蒂埃里-布雷顿（Thierry Breton）说，欧盟必须抵制美国影响其旨在监管社交媒体平台的立法的企图。【原文：Thierry Breton, the former European Union official who was sanctioned last week by the Trump administration, said the bloc must resist US attempts to influence its legislation aimed at regulating social media platforms.】

item.title: 美国银行的莫伊尼汉认为特朗普的关税政策开始缓和
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.首席执行官布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）表示，在2025年关税对美国经济造成冲击之后，他预计特朗普政府明年将缓和贸易紧张局势。【原文：Bank of America Corp. Chief Executive Officer Brian Moynihan said he expects the Trump administration to de-escalate trade tensions next year after tariffs sent shockwaves through the US economy in 2025.】

item.title: 阿萨德忠实拥护者在叙利亚海岸袭击政府军
item.description: 叙利亚内政部将该国地中海沿岸的暴力事件归咎于巴沙尔-阿萨德被推翻政权的残余势力。【原文：At least three people were killed and 60 injured in Latakia, with Syria’s Interior Ministry blaming the violence along the country’s Mediterranean coastline on the remnants of Bashar al-Assad’s toppled regime.】

item.title: 路易斯-格斯特纳逝世，他是IBM首席执行官，被誉为IBM扭亏为盈的功臣，享年83岁
item.description: 路易斯-格斯特纳（Louis Gerstner）于周六去世，他在国际商用机器公司（International Business Machines Corp.享年 83 岁。【原文：Louis Gerstner, who took over International Business Machines Corp. when it was on its deathbed and resuscitated it as a technology industry leader, died Saturday. He was 83.】

item.title: 土耳其中央银行将扩大主要债券组合以提高 "灵活性
item.description: 土耳其央行明年将加大政府债券购买力度，以加强用于管理里拉流动性的关键投资组合。【原文：Turkey’s central bank will boost government bond purchases next year to strengthen a key portfolio that’s used in managing lira liquidity.】

item.title: 伊朗称从俄罗斯向太空发射了三颗卫星
item.description: 伊朗称其周日从俄罗斯将三颗卫星送入轨道，此举可能会加剧德黑兰更广泛行动的紧张局势。【原文：Iran said it sent three satellites into orbit from Russia on Sunday, a move that may intensify tensions over Tehran’s broader actions.】

item.title: 警告：新兴市场一周前瞻将于 1 月 4 日重启
item.description: 新兴市场一周前瞻》专栏和 "新兴市场发生了什么 "播客将于 12 月 28 日（星期日）停止发布。这两个栏目将于 1 月 4 日星期日恢复。【原文：The Emerging Markets Week Ahead column and the “What’s Happening in EM” podcast won’t be published on Sunday, Dec. 28. Both will resume on Sunday, Jan. 4.】

item.title: 津巴布韦中央银行行长表示，津巴布韦将在 2026 年继续购买矿产
item.description: 津巴布韦央行行长约翰-穆沙亚万胡于周日表示，津巴布韦将在 2026 年继续进行战略性矿产采购，以建立外汇储备，同时推进到 2030 年采用 ZiG 作为其唯一货币的计划。【原文：Zimbabwe will continue to make strategic mineral purchases in 2026 in order to build its foreign currency reserves, as it pushes ahead with plans to adopt the ZiG as its sole currency by 2030, central bank governor John Mushayavanhu said on Sunday.】

item.title: 中国在 2026 年计划中发出持续财政支持经济增长的信号
item.description: 中国承诺在 2026 年扩大财政支出基数，这表明政府将继续提供支持，在充满挑战的外部环境中推动经济增长。【原文：China pledged to broaden its fiscal spending base in 2026, signaling sustained government support to drive growth in a challenging external environment.】
